__e: I know you think they're pulling something, but that's because you can't imagine anyone ever valuing me as a real asset, when the truth is I've done more for you and the lawsuit than you've ever done for me or yourself.
No, I was the worst mother in the world when I knew he was up to something, and I didn't do anything about it.
Well, you think he's up to something, Why don't you run him out of town?
You're working some angle, and don't tell me you're not, because I wrote the book
Look, I know you and your brother are up to something.
What I think is that whatever it is you're up to appears to be working, and my son should know that.
